props.title: About New York Sash | Your Trusted Local Partner
Your Trusted Local Partner
props.subtitle: For over four decades, New York Sash has been Central New York's premier home improvement company. What started as a small family business has grown into the region's most trusted provider of windows, siding, bathrooms, and entry doors.
props.badge: Family-Owned Since 1988 ‚Ä¢ Better Business Bureau A+ Rating

props.title: Your Trusted Local Partner
props.description: For over four decades, New York Sash has been Central New York's premier home improvement company. What started as a small family business has grown into the region's most trusted provider of windows, siding, bathrooms, and entry doors.
props.additionalText: We understand that your home is your most important investment. That's why we're committed to providing the highest quality products, expert installation, and exceptional customer service that has earned us an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau.

props.title: Our Story
props.subtitle: From humble beginnings to regional leader - see how we've grown while improving our commitment to quality and service

timelineItems.title: Company Founded
timelineItems.description: New York Sash was established as a small, family-owned business with a simple goal: to bring quality home improvement services to Central New York families at fair prices.

timelineItems.title: First Showroom Opens
timelineItems.description: We opened our first showroom, allowing customers to see and touch our products before making their investment decision.

timelineItems.title: Expanding Services
timelineItems.description: Added bathroom remodeling to our services, becoming a full-service home improvement company.

timelineItems.title: ENERGY STAR Partnership
timelineItems.description: Became an ENERGY STAR partner, committing to energy-efficient products that help homeowners save money and protect the environment.

timelineItems.title: Advanced Installation Training
timelineItems.description: Implemented comprehensive training program for our installation teams, raising every project team to the highest standards of craftsmanship.

timelineItems.title: Digital Innovation
timelineItems.description: Enhanced digital tools and virtual consultations to better serve customers while maintaining our personal touch and commitment to service.

timelineItems.title: Leading the Industry
timelineItems.description: Continuing to lead Central New York's home improvement industry with innovative products, expert installation, and exceptional customer service.

props.title: Our Core Values
props.subtitle: These principles guide everything we do and ensure exceptional experience they deserve

values.title: Integrity
values.description: We believe in honest communication, fair pricing and transparent business practices with every customer.

values.title: Quality
values.description: We use only the finest products and employ skilled, experienced professionals with years of proven expertise.

values.title: Service
values.description: Every customer deserves our full attention to exceed customer expectations from start to finish.

values.title: Community
values.description: We're proud part of Central New York and work hard to give back through our community service efforts.

values.title: Expertise
values.description: Continuous learning and product innovation to keep our team educated on the latest technologies and best installation practices.

values.title: Sustainability
values.description: We prioritize eco-friendly products and practices that reduce environmental impact and provide long-term value for our customers.

props.title: Certifications & Recognition
props.subtitle: Our commitment to excellence and quality is evident through the industry recognitions and the trust of thousands of customers
